banner.title: The First Nudist Barbershop in Europe
banner.description: Get ready for a unique, intense, and absolutely limitless experience. Here, style meets freedom. Forget the clothes, forget the conventional – it's just you, the razor, and the pleasure of feeling completely free.

p.1: Chico Nudist Barbershop was born from a bold and liberating idea — inspired by Chico’s experiences in other countries, where he discovered places dedicated to male care without barriers, without masks, and without prejudice.
p.2: Here, all men are welcome exactly as they are. There are no judgments, only acceptance, respect, and a safe environment where naturalness is celebrated. The body is just part of the experience — the focus is on well-being, confidence, and the freedom to be authentic.
p.3: More than just a barbershop, this is a space for relaxation and discovery, where each client can unwind, talk, laugh, and perhaps explore new sensations and fantasies they never imagined.
p.4: In the end, it all comes down to this:
p.5: feeling good in your own skin.

1.name: Haircut
1.description: Modern or classic cuts performed by experienced professionals. We use current techniques to ensure a result that matches your style. A complete service that includes finishing with high-quality products.

2.name: Beard / Beard Therapy
2.description: Complete beard treatment with hydration, shaping, and traditional barbershop techniques. Includes hot towel, special oils, and professional finishing for a clean and renewed look.

3.name: Waxing / Machine Hair Removal
3.description: Hair removal service using wax or machine, depending on the client’s preference. Effectively removes hair, leaving the skin smoother and more comfortable. Ideal for those seeking practicality and hygiene.

4.name: Relaxing Massage
4.description: A gentle massage that relieves tension and reduces everyday stress. Uses light and enveloping movements to promote deep relaxation. Perfect for restoring energy and balance.

5.name: Hot Stone Massage
5.description: Therapeutic massage using heated stones to relieve muscle pain. The heat penetrates deeply, providing intense relaxation. Ideal for those suffering from accumulated tension.

6.name: Body Scrub Massage
6.description: A combination of relaxing massage with a full body exfoliation. Removes dead skin cells, stimulates circulation, and leaves the skin softer and renewed. A revitalizing experience that blends well-being and aesthetic care.

question.1: Who can visit Chico Nudist Barbershop?
question.2: Do I need to book an appointment to visit Chico Nudist Barbershop?
question.3: Is it mandatory to be naked?
question.4: Are the professionals at Chico Nudist Barbershop always naked?
question.5: Is there interaction between clients and professionals?
question.7: Is there any private space for client interaction?
question.8: Is smoking or the use of other substances allowed inside the barbershop?
question.9: Is it allowed to take photos or record videos inside the barbershop?

answer.1: As a barbershop, the space was designed mainly with a male audience in mind. However, entry is allowed to anyone aged 18 or over.
answer.2: Yes! Access to the barbershop is always granted through a prior appointment for one of the services offered, whether in barbering, aesthetics, or well-being.
answer.3: No, you are not required to be naked! At Chico Nudist Barbershop, you may come as you prefer: dressed, in underwear, or completely nude. What matters is that you feel comfortable!
answer.4: All professionals at Chico Nudist Barbershop perform their services fully nude. However, during breaks or when not attending clients, they may choose to remain nude or wear underwear.
answer.5: To maintain a pleasant environment and ensure the professionalism of our staff, interaction with employees may be limited so as not to interfere with the services being provided—whether yours or those of other clients. Mutual respect always comes first.
answer.6: The environment at Chico Nudist Barbershop was designed to make everyone feel comfortable. Interaction between clients may occur, provided mutual respect and respect for ongoing services are maintained.
answer.7: No, there is no private space. The barbershop was created to offer moments of relaxation and discovery, encouraging social interaction within the shared environment.
answer.8: Smoking or consuming any type of illegal substance is strictly prohibited inside the barbershop. If a client is caught doing so, they will be asked to leave, and future access will be denied.
answer.9: Taking photographs or recording videos inside the barbershop is only allowed with the express authorization of all individuals who may appear in the images. Chico Nudist Barbershop is not responsible for any unauthorized recordings, although we will do everything within our power to prevent such situations. Respect for professionals and other clients is essential to guaranteeing everyone’s privacy and well-being.
